name: Garrett Cobb
text: Please support this shop as it is the only one we have around here. The owner Brian is very knowledgeable as he was one of the old school skaters. I'm 41 and this shop brings back alot of memories from when I started skating. #supportyourlocalskateshop

name: Cedric Lee
text: If you keep going, he starts to know what stuff you want, next time you go, he ends up having it.

name: Phillip Allen
text: 10 stars!! I have been going to Brian's skate shop since I was 10 years old. He is always super nice and easy to talk to. If you have questions about your skateboard, he is the guy to go to. ALWAYS GREAT PRICES AND GREAT QUALITY EQUIPMENT!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

name: William Hernández
text: Pretty cool skateshop! Super friendly service. Definitely recommend it!

name: Antonio Lucero
text: Good selection of decks and hardware. Helpful and awesome customer service. Worth driving to from Montgomery area. Got a deck and some grip tape for a good price and Brian slapped the tape on for me.

name: Trevor Popravak
text: Awesome skate store ☠💀☠

name: Kristin Nicole Terstriep
text: My husband and I went in today to get him a board, and it was a great experience. Brian was so helpful and just seemed like a really good guy.  He has a good selection, and is very knowledgeable. We will definitely be back and I would recommend this place 100%

name: Shane Corbin
text: Great owner, shares his love of the sport with customers. Great prices too

name: Jim J
text: Brian has your skateboard needs covered. He has the presence of a mythical creature who never ages. His skateboard knowledge is one of true mastery. Thanks again for providing premium service!

name: Katelyn Viskup
text: Very knowledgeable in skateboarding. Great vibe. Various brands and styles to choose from. Brain is awesome!

name: Sarah Millard
text: Great skateshop with a skate slab to do some tricks. Brian is a very friendly and knowledgeable person who also goes the extra mile to help skaters with their tricks. The shop offers all of your skateboard needs. He also sells snacks/candies, drinks, apparel, and accessories.

name: Joshua Clark
text: Its awesome man, not to professional everyones cool as hell and laid back. Brian is a dope dude helps skaters out when they dont know how to do a trick. If your looking for a little place to go to skate... This is a great spot especially for beginners. Great place to hangout.

name: David Boatwright
text: Great skate shop with a good selection to fill all of your skate needs

name: JaNae Thomas
text: Small but homey. He had everything we needed and was very knowledgeable and helpful. I will be going back there.

name: Duke “the Dwarf” Lancaster
text: a friend recommended me to Brians skate shop I talked to him for an hour or so about skating him haveing an answer for every question I had and I had alot because I'm new to skateboarding I wasn't .Originaly planning to buy a board  just to figure out if I did want one but I figured I did want to and he sat there and made me a board for a good price 10/10 would go there again

name: Robert Birge
text: Great place to get a skateboard and great prices he took time with my son and helping design the perfect skateboard and then he showed him a few tricks will visit again for sure

name: Luke Flanders
text: Wow great shop Brian is extremely knowlegable and offers the best service!

name: Joseph Halford
text: He is a real cool guy will help you with all your skating needs

name: Alex Williams
text: Best skate shop around! Love being here, I wouldn't buy skate gear from anyone else.

name: Jennifer Briggs
text: Helped me pick out a board for my daughter. Wonderful service

name: Ethan Grabowski
text: Great and safe place for people looking to skate. Shop sells snacks if you get hungry, and has two ramps set up for tricks.

name: Naoki The Wicker
text: Epic shop cool owner chill place to buy anything for your board.

name: Todd Buckelew
text: Great place! Great owner!

name: Colton Zeth
text: Best skate shop ever.

name: Cheyenne Morrison
text: Raddest shop owner in the Wiregrass.

name: Chris Carnley
text: Great ppl

name: Deborah Trammell
text: Very professional. Respected by all

name: Addison&brianna inspire
text: Best one near me

name: David and Diana George
text: We went there to buy a long board for our son.  It is his first one and we know nothing about them.  The staff there is very knowledgeable and extremely helpful.  Outstanding customer service.  They spent about 20 minutes with us helping to pick the right board.  If you are in the market for a skate board and/or gear, I highly recommend visiting this location.

name: Marcus Irby
text: I've only been to this location. This location needs more employees who skate. Only so the local skaters might actually want to come in for more than just clothes and parts because they need them now. The employees aren't dumb, just out of their element.

name: Rekcorc Gaming
text: Prices are a little high but, great place overall.

name: S B
text: My son loves the clothes at this store

name: Exotic Topicz
text: Rude and unprofessional FOR KIDS obviously if you are use to highend retailers/fashion STAY AWAY

name: Darrius Stringer
text: The manager today was kinda helpful she could’ve showed a little better customer service tho

name: Derrick Gerrick
text: Staff was very helpful and friendly even gave me children a BUNCH of stickers

name: Mya 2Classy
text: Good customer service

name: Jalon Baldwin
text: Tons of dope gear. Journeys on steroids.

name: Malevolent One
text: They accuse people of stealing when they aren't even near the door

name: Alien Xenu
text: great staff

name: Ian Baas
text: Great local skate shop with a nice selection of recommended parts for all types of Skateboards. I  just  wish I had gone here sooner.   I had been in search of the perfect hybrid cruiser w/ double kicks for weeks and after just 20 mins talking with Josh  I walked out with exactly what I had been wanting.  A smooth roller that can still Ollie!

name: Keontae Satcher
text: Nice store. The owner is really friendly too!

name: Hack Fraud
text: I wanted to longboard and didn't know where to start, I called ahead and the owner (Josh) said he could hook me up. I knew nothing about longboarding and he got me a longboard that I absolutely love, and I ride it almost every week at my local skate park. It was well worth the drive to Auburn to pick it up.

name: Christian Santos
text: Good service and the owner (Josh) is very knowledgeable. Great shop.

name: Vyom Parmar
text:
Josh, you the G.O.A.T.! Very informative and helpful! Has all the skateboarding stuff you need.
Also has offers from time to time like discounts for first time purchases.
Looking forward to visiting again.

name: TJ Funches
text: Too bad it's going out of business but a great guy and a great shop

name: SketchBleach
text: Really awesome store! I recommend this place whenever anyone asks me where I got my board. The guy who runs it is extremely nice and helpful.

name: Max Wimberly
text: Owner was great and helpful...definitely coming back.

name: J J
text: By far the most OG of businesses in the Lee County Area and probably further. Josh (the owner) is one of the best folks you'll ever meet and he stays true to what he believes in by practicing what he preaches. The man isn't rich, but does what he loves and does it right. ...oh yeah he's got all the right skate/longboard gear and a plethora of accessories and add ons to choose from. If you're going to support any local shop, this is definitely one to consider.

name: Derek Godwin
text: Great skate shop. Extremely glad to finally have a skate shop in the Auburn area. Stop reading reviews and go get some new stuff from Josh already.

name: Lil Babbu
text: Real nice shop with parts that are usually more expensive from other vendors.

name: Spencer Mashburn
text: Josh is the man! Whether you're just getting into skating or have been doing it your whole life, Josh has what you need.

name: Aiden Bailey
text: It's really sad more people dont know about this place

name: JÅMØ ŠTÊPHËŃŠ
text: Best place to get what you need to skate and have fun

name: Brandon Gurubel
text:
Great product, assembly, price, and overall experience!
So thankful to have a full-service shop in Auburn 😎

name: Ataman Billor
text: Awesome store. Support your local skate shop!

name: Ruize Xu
text: Good help and good skateboard

name: james s
text: this is a great little skate shop

name: Jared McGreevy
text: First sandwich was a couple months ago, they make the best I’ve had in Birmingham. Cool little store with nice staff. If you want a bomb sandwich look no further.

resp.text: Thanks for the Support Jared! Hope to see you gain soon. Cheers

name: alesia adams
text: We love Ore!  The deli has the best sandwiches in town and the shops have eclectic and interesting items. It is a great hidden gem in Avondale. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Alesia!! We greatly appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you again! Cheers

name: Jorge Camacho Yau
text: Place is really nice and the staff members are very welcoming. Love the vibe and the layout of the store!! Everyone is super nice.. I really like the deli. Fresh products and service is top notch. I strongly recommend this place. Got to talk to the owners every time I come by and they are super nice people.. please come by check it out and support local business.

name: sean williamson
text: Great food Sandwich (PCP) & pasta salad, super friendly staff, and clean comfortable vibe. Great addition to the neighborhood!

resp.text: Thanks for the support Sean! We look forward to seeing you in the future! Cheers.

name: Mat Burkett
text: One of the coolest places around! Great selection of products and the food is fantastic!! Great people and service!

resp.text: Thanks for the support Mat! See you next time. Cheers

name: Frog Price
text:
Bread on the 12 inch Crestwood was good. Big sandwich. Quality meat and cheese. Good veggies. Too much bread. Not enough stuff inside. Less meat and cheese than a Subway or any other 12 inch deli sandwich. Not a good value.
Store was nice. I found some good quality patches for my patch jacket. I bought one of each of the four available.

name: Alexander Flachsbart
text: FINALLY birmingham has a good sandwich shop! Ore has some of the absolute best sandwiches I have ever eaten in my life. Get the Crestwood toasted. You’ll thank me later. Oh and go on saturdays for the muffuletta. Best I have had outside New Orleans.

name: Wes Mitchell
text: Excellent service. Food is amazing! Sandwiches are superbly made, fresh, and they taste fantastic. Mozzarella and basil bites are delicious! Not to mention this place has the coolest stuff in town. Everyone should check out Ore.

name: Kimberly Bivins
text:
Great place to buy gifts for family and friends, or if you just want to grab something for yourself.

Also, they’ve opened up a deli with delicious sandwiches and fresh made sides!

name: Duane Boatright
text: Great place with great style. I really enjoyed my sandwich from the deli and the snacks I purchased from the bodega. I recommend swinging by and snack while you shop.

name: BIRMINGHAM BROKER Business
text: We absolutely love this place. I have been able to purchase everything from really cool T-shirts to skateboard supplies for  my kiddo. They have great brands like Filson, Pendleton, Howler, etc.  Great concept.  Not to mention they just opened a deli that we enjoy at least once a week. Bravo. Fully support and recommend.

name: Josef Schuster
text: If you have not been yet do yourself a favor and go check out Ore. It’s a top notch place to grab a fantastic sandwich for lunch I go once a week ( be sure to Try one of the sides they are all great (oh and for sure get a cannoli... you will be happy you did) if the great food isn’t reason enough to stop in, add the unique items for sale in the store end and you will quickly realize that this is a very unique spot that Avondale and Birmingham are lucky to have. Oh I almost forgot to mention any time I have been all the folks who work there are always happy to help and make you feel at home. Bottom line What are you waiting for go get some great grub and find that gift you needed or get something cool for yourself !!! You will be happy you went..

name: PJ Aguirre
text: The sandwiches here are awesome! High quality ingredients & huge! Friendly staff too, in a cool local shop.

name: Greg Grammen
text: Just visited Ore Mercantile for the first time. Had a terrific experience shopping and ended my visit with a fantastic Sammy!! Will be back on the regular.

name: SometimeAfterTwoAM
text: It's about time Birmingham got an authentic italian deli.  I can honestly say I have experienced the real thing in NYC, Long Beach, and LA and this is comparable to all 3 of those.  I had the 6" Avondale and it was more than I could eat.  I don't see how anyone could eat a 12" alone.  I didn't weigh the meat but I'd guess this was 2X the amount of meat & cheese as you'd get on a 12" from Subway or Firehouse Subs and that's on a 6" sandwich.  Bread was gourmet and excellent.  Probably the largest selection of unique sodas and bottled beverages I've ever seen at a restaurant.  I'd estimate there are more than 50 different drinks NOT including traditional Coke and Pepsi products.  Friendly staff made me want to return ASAP.  You cannot go wrong with this true authentic italian deli.

name: Shane B
text: If you want a good sandwich here's the place! Nice service and good portions.

name: gus contreras
text: Such a rad store!!  It’s my one stop shop for birthday and Christmas gifts.  I can’t wait to try out the deli!!

name: mick bruce
text: Great sandwiches loved the Crestwood!

name: Alberto Enes
text: Came for the sandwich, stayed for the cannoli

resp.text: Thanks! Hope to see you again. Cheers

name: Tyler Russell
text: A little something for everyone! So many retailers with something for yourself, friends, and family. Plus, BOILED PEANUTS!!!

name: Jenni Otwell
text: Great spot to shop for yourself or for buying gifts for friends and family!

name: Alex & Katie McKown
text: Love this place!!

name: Chloe Jayy
text: Great people great prices. 10/10 reccomend. Definitely stop by this place. They got everything you might need and it wont cost an arm and a leg.

name: Dark One
text: Great service and the owner is doing what he can to help the community.

name: Keith Tamber
text: Phenomenal shop, awesome people and great prices!

name: Angela Trucks
text: The people were nice and very helpful.

name: Helen Gallups
text: Awesome place to go...

name: Carter Sellers
text: Nice store, friendly staff
